extendedInfo.description: Act Fast is a simple, yet challenging game designed for everyone and anyone. The game is easy to play: the icons in the shaded region at the bottom of the screen are buttons, press the buttons when you see their matching icon falling coming down the screen, but make sure you press them in the right order!Challenge your friends and family or challenge yourself to try to beat your best time!

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: Game got potential.... kinda time killer...like it
reviews.author: A Google User
